entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Stack Trace Explorer #76165
  • Area - Code Cleanup #76158
  • CTRL + click (and F12) on a partial property should always jump to user-defined part #76156
  • Files *.g.cs are not generated in `obj` folder #76155
  • Make anonymous function static (IDE0320) analyzer is extremely slow on .Net 8.0.401 #76154
  • Area - Call Hierarchy #76146

Closed

  • Consider moving AddImport implementation to Workspace layer #59179
    Backlog
  • Explore having a regex codefix that offers to simplify regex when possible. #59165
    Backlog
  • RE0001 should be moved to Analyzers layer #59101
    Backlog
  • VB IDE0058 change to Call or make unused a keyword #59063
    Backlog
  • Create a test for AdditiveSpans changes #58984
    Backlog
  • Implement interface quick fix does not add class brackets for nested types #26323
    Backlog
  • AbstractSpellCheckCodeFixProvider depends on IDE completion options #58745
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense not suggesting namespaces after `using` for top-level statements #58470
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup removes usings from external C# files #75979
  • "Remove Unnecessary Usings" should not delete blank lines above the using declaration. #55439
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35528.57 #76153
  • Inline Temporary Variable generates invalid code #53002
    Backlog
  • Set severity from Error List completely deletes existing editorconfig #51867
    Backlog
  • There is a conflict between the options for Pitch Settings #50061
    Backlog
  • removing unused usings when compile errors present #48337
    Backlog
  • Remove JTF.Run for razor mapping #47909
    18.0
  • Find References should identify 'new()' generic constraint as a use of parameterless constructor #47633
    Backlog
  • Missing using when Move To "class.cs" Quick-Action #46757
    Backlog
  • 'Generate inequality operators' when type already implements IComparable<> #41790
    Backlog
  • Add a refactoring to convert conditional to if statement #29346
    Backlog
  • Saving Visual Basic naming conventions that contain module specifications to an editorconfig file crashes Visual Studio #39845
    Backlog
  • C#, Inconsistant Label Indentation when Formatting #39169
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup during formatting: Remove unnecessary usings - Give option not to remove system namspace #38383
    Backlog
  • VB line commit should add missing argument parentheses #36545
    Backlog
  • VB Editor changed VB keywords casing although they are used as literal strings in my code! #35028
    Backlog
  • Go to Member - see all members even if you type nothing #34877
    Backlog
  • Suggest format specifiers based on type #34189
    Backlog
  • Make it possible to decide style rules based on context #34129
    Backlog
  • Find All References does not support using statements #34107
    Backlog
  • Summary of Possible Change Signature Enhancements #33977
    Backlog
  • StaticKeywordRecommender doesn't give a stable answer between usings in script #32214
    18.0
  • Include performance warning in loop conversion #31780
    Backlog
  • Formatting option for space after // #30239
    Backlog
  • `fixed` keyword formatting doesn't respect `Insert space after keywords in control flow statements` #29341
    Backlog
  • Go To support for decompiled types/members #28275
    Backlog
  • Unit Tests: Caret position not properly restored after undo when the original caret position doesn't match the location of the text change #28033
    18.0
  • SyntaxEditor.SetModifiers may not properly format the result when multiple modifiers are added at once #27835
    Backlog
  • Formatting is applied too aggressively on 'override' completion #27207
    Backlog
  • "Use collection initializer" indents trailing trivia #26529
    Backlog
  • Improve completion support for obsolete members #26488
    Backlog
  • async Main with multiple entrypoints #26315
    Backlog
  • Add CamelHumps selection similar to that of resharper #24823
    Backlog
  • Inline Refactoring Rename Issue with Regions in Visual Basic #24087
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: Convert lambda to local function #23310
    Backlog
  • Change Signature should not be offered inside a string-literal. #18023
    Backlog
  • Array constructor currently falls under the csharp_style_var_elsewhere category. #17109
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense based on characters to the left of the cursor #13594
    Backlog
  • CodeLens count is inconsistent across partial declarations and linked file #13530
    Backlog
  • [Code Style] Implement a way to change style settings #13439
    Backlog
  • IDE Features should work on preprocessor symbols (rename, FAR, GTD, completion, etc) #11499
    Backlog
  • Removing unused using formats/changes other parts of the document #10237
    Backlog
  • ImportAdder API can result in new document having ambiguity errors #8604
    Backlog
  • [VB] 'Simplify type name' on Global alias and base class name introduces a conflict #8292
    Backlog
  • Refactoring "Introduce local for all occurences of..." does more than it should be allowed to #7504
    Backlog
  • XAML references are partially highlighted when searching for references from a constructor #7294
    Backlog
  • Find refs within a metadata as source view doesn't search it #6716
    Backlog
  • Invalid pretty-lister behavior when #If directive is preceeded by a semicolon #5570
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense autoselection for enums when inside of an enum should not include type name #5418
    Backlog
  • Cannot set background of XML Doc Comment CREFs, param names or param refs #4948
    Backlog
  • Implement extension method rewrite for Expanding within conditional access expressions #3260
    Backlog
  • Formatting: space after "delegate" in anonymous methods doesn't respect the "Space between method call and opening parenthesis" option #3257
    Backlog
  • Brace Matching should format embedded statement owner when inserting braces #3025
    Backlog
  • Completion: Shift+Home, Delete shouldn't trigger completion #698
    Backlog
  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync fails detect type-inference change when removing necessary cast #476
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more tests for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/76083 #76164
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clamp selections within a string literal so they do not go outside of it #76163
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use implicit initializer if present to generate type properties #76162
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue trying to generate fields/properties from a top level program #76161
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support implicit/explicit var with inferred lambda types #76160
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Delete dupe loc strings #76159
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Property update return type when updating method. #76157
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Insert parens when hitting semicolon after 'new' #76152
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support static members in extract interface #76151
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue with explicit interface completion and static interface members #76150
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move off of specialized task methods #76149
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • REmove methods no longer in use #76148
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'introduce using' to support expression statements #76147
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Infer better variable name when initializing from an anonymous type #76145
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do a better job matching properties to implement against existing properties #76144
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable skipped test #76143
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Format labeled statements when colon is typed #76142
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary EOL package references #76073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Make in memory assemblies in InteractiveAssemblyLoader can be collected when use scripting #74915
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Add a dedicated fixer to fixup code in expression trees that is now calling restricted apis #76124
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update the patterns that 'use range operator' supports. #76129
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
